name: Aeronaut Cavalry
oracle_text:
Flying
When Aeronaut Cavalry enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on another target Soldier you control.
flavor_text:
"The ground is where wars are waged, but the air is where they are won."
—Harbin, vanguard aviator

name: Aeronaut's Wings
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has flying.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: Volunteers rarely questioned why the airborne battalion always seemed to be recruiting.

name: Airlift Chaplain
oracle_text:
Flying
When Airlift Chaplain enters the battlefield, mill three cards. You may put a Plains card or a creature card with mana value 3 or less from among the cards milled this way into your hand. If you don't, put a +1/+1 counter on Airlift Chaplain. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

name: Air Marshal
oracle_text: {3}: Target Soldier gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Today our blades remember Kroog! May the seven brass gods be with us!"

name: Ambush Paratrooper
oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
{5}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "It would be folly to fight a dragon engine head-on. Let's hit it from above."

name: Argothian Opportunist
oracle_text: When Argothian Opportunist enters the battlefield, create a tapped Powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")
flavor_text: "Nature adapts. So should we."

name: Argothian Sprite
oracle_text:
Argothian Sprite can't be blocked by artifact creatures.
{7}: Put two +1/+1 counters on Argothian Sprite.
flavor_text:
"Make the exhaust vents smaller next time!"
—Urza, notes to his engineers

name: Ashnod's Intervention
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, return it to its owner's hand."
flavor_text: "Listen, Duck. Gix is everywhere, playing every side. Mishra won't listen . . . but perhaps Urza will."

name: Bitter Reunion
oracle_text:
When Bitter Reunion enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw two cards.
{1}, Sacrifice Bitter Reunion: Creatures you control gain haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: The peace summit proved the grudge between Urza and Mishra could end only in blood.

name: Blanchwood Prowler
oracle_text: When Blanchwood Prowler enters the battlefield, mill three cards. You may put a land card from among the cards milled this way into your hand. If you don't, put a +1/+1 counter on Blanchwood Prowler. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

name: Blitz Automaton
oracle_text:
Prototype {2}{R} — 3/2 (You may cast this spell with different mana cost, color, and size. It keeps its abilities and types.)
Haste
flavor_text: While Urza's machines favored defense, Mishra built his to end the war quickly.

name: Boulderbranch Golem
oracle_text:
Prototype {3}{G} — 3/3 (You may cast this spell with different mana cost, color, and size. It keeps its abilities and types.)
When Boulderbranch Golem enters the battlefield, you gain life equal to its power.
flavor_text:
"Artifice is not the only form of creation."
—Titania

name: Burrowing Razormaw
oracle_text: When Burrowing Razormaw dies, mill four cards. (Put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor_text:
"That's odd. I don't remember seeing plans to dig a trench near here."
—Lognell, Argivian scout

name: Carrion Locust
oracle_text:
Flying
When Carrion Locust enters the battlefield, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard. If it was a creature card, that player loses 1 life.
flavor_text: No honor. No glory. No leftovers.

name: Citanul Stalwart
oracle_text: {T}, Tap an untapped artifact or creature you control: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: The endless grind of the Brothers' War had fouled Terisiare's land and blackened its skies. Argoth's defenders were determined to protect their isle from the same fate.

name: Clay Revenant
oracle_text:
Clay Revenant enters the battlefield tapped.
{2}{B}: Return Clay Revenant from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Tawnos built his clay statues for durability, not knowing they'd keep fighting long after the war.

name: Coastal Bulwark
oracle_text:
Defender
Coastal Bulwark gets +2/+0 as long as you control an Island.
{2}, {T}: Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

name: Combat Courier
oracle_text:
{2}, Sacrifice Combat Courier: Draw a card.
Unearth {U} ({U}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Conscripted Infantry
oracle_text: When Conscripted Infantry dies, create a 1/1 colorless Soldier artifact creature token.
flavor_text: "Funny," remarked Laga to his squad. "Mishra's lackeys wear luxurious silks in their gilded palaces, while we toil in the trenches eating stale bread."

name: Curate
oracle_text:
Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "Aha! This must be one of the ancient keys to... No, wait. It's just another puzzle toy."

name: Deadly Riposte
oracle_text: Deadly Riposte deals 3 damage to target tapped creature and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"Automatons are fast, precise, and tireless, but they all share one weakness: predictability. Learn their patterns. Strike when they're vulnerable."
—Horance, Urzan general

name: Depth Charge Colossus
oracle_text:
Prototype {4}{U}{U} — 6/6 (You may cast this spell with different mana cost, color, and size. It keeps its abilities and types.)
Depth Charge Colossus doesn't untap during your untap step.
{3}: Untap Depth Charge Colossus.

name: Desynchronize
oracle_text: Target nonland permanent's owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library. Scry 2.
flavor_text: Before Kaya could pull Teferi's spirit back, the overloaded temporal anchor failed, and he was set adrift in the currents of time.

name: Disenchant
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: "One down, several thousand more to go."

name: Disfigure
oracle_text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: With a snap of metal like a strike of lightning, the tide of war shifted in Mishra's favor.

name: Dredging Claw
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield from your graveyard, you may attach Dredging Claw to it.
Equip {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Dwarven Forge-Chanter
oracle_text:
Ward—Pay 2 life. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 2 life.)
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

name: Emergency Weld
oracle_text: Return target artifact or creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Create a 1/1 colorless Soldier artifact creature token.
flavor_text: Scurrying repair bots quietly turned the tide of many battles, patching damaged automatons back into fighting form.

name: Energy Refractor
oracle_text:
When Energy Refractor enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{2}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text:
"Raw energy contains infinite possibility."
—Urza

name: Epic Confrontation
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +1/+2 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text:
"You've let yourself grow old, and your light is dimming. Shall we talk one last time, or must I slay you now?"
—Mishra, to Urza

name: Evolving Wilds
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"There's a certain beauty in destruction. Some will consider this war a masterpiece."
—Ashnod

name: Excavation Explosion
oracle_text: Excavation Explosion deals 3 damage to any target. Create a tapped Powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")
flavor_text: Urza's engineers could take weeks to dig out a powerstone. The goblins weren't so painstaking.

name: Fallaji Archaeologist
oracle_text: When Fallaji Archaeologist enters the battlefield, mill three cards. You may put a noncreature, nonland card from among the cards milled this way into your hand. If you don't, put a +1/+1 counter on Fallaji Archaeologist. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

name: Fallaji Chaindancer
oracle_text: {2}: Fallaji Chaindancer gains double strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: She was eager to show the invading Yotians how she earned her nickname, "The Sandstorm of Tomakul."

name: Fog of War
oracle_text: You gain 1 life for each creature on the battlefield. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures with power 3 or less.
flavor_text: So thick was the fog on Argoth's shores that the brothers' forces passed within shouting distance of each other without realizing it.

name: Gaea's Gift
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains reach, trample, hexproof, and indestructible until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control. Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor_text: When it came to fighting an army of trees, even Mishra's best generals were stumped.

name: Giant Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Imagine being scared of pixies. Just smoosh them under your boot!"
—Kerish, Urzan mechanist

name: Gixian Infiltrator
oracle_text: Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Gixian Infiltrator.
flavor_text: "Terisia City's fall is inevitable. My master's plan runs as sure and steady as the oil in my veins."

name: Gixian Skullflayer
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are three or more creature cards in your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Gixian Skullflayer.
flavor_text: "With every culling, we bring this world closer to *compleation*."

name: Gix's Caress
oracle_text:
Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
Create a tapped Powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")
flavor_text: "Show me all the delicious misery you've sown."

name: Gnarlroot Pallbearer
oracle_text:
Trample
When Gnarlroot Pallbearer enters the battlefield, target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text: The flames of war consumed most of Argoth's treefolk. Vengeance consumed the rest.

name: Goblin Blast-Runner
oracle_text: Goblin Blast-Runner gets +2/+0 and has menace as long as you sacrificed a permanent this turn.
flavor_text: Most goblins can light a fuse and run, but only the cleverest remember to drop the bomb.

name: Goblin Firebomb
oracle_text:
Flash
{7}, {T}, Sacrifice Goblin Firebomb: Destroy target permanent.
flavor_text:
"And if this works, Tawnos is gonna let us build the full-sized version!"
—Tergel, goblin explosioneer

name: Goring Warplow
oracle_text:
Prototype {1}{B} — 1/1 (You may cast this spell with different mana cost, color, and size. It keeps its abilities and types.)
Deathtouch
flavor_text: Built to crush walls and wills in equal measure.

name: Hoarding Recluse
oracle_text:
Reach, deathtouch
When Hoarding Recluse dies, put up to one other target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor_text: To the spiders of Argoth, thopters were just bigger, crunchier flies.

name: Kill-Zone Acrobat
oracle_text: Whenever Kill-Zone Acrobat attacks, you may sacrifice another creature or artifact. If you do, Kill-Zone Acrobat gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Her circus training proved surprisingly valuable on the battlefield.

name: Koilos Roc
oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
When Koilos Roc enters the battlefield, create a tapped Powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")

name: Lat-Nam Adept
oracle_text: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Lat-Nam Adept.
flavor_text: "Every book is a doorway to enlightenment. Curiosity is your key."

name: Loran's Escape
oracle_text: Target artifact or creature gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. Scry 1.
flavor_text: As Terisia City burned, Feldon pressed the sylex into Loran's hands and urged her to run. Hope ran with her.

name: Machine Over Matter
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control an artifact creature.
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: The Warlord decreed that only someone who could move the statue would be strong enough to marry the princess. So Urza moved it.

name: Mightstone's Animation
oracle_text:
Enchant artifact
When Mightstone's Animation enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted artifact is a creature with base power and toughness 4/4 in addition to its other types.

name: Military Discipline
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
When Military Discipline enters the battlefield, enchanted creature gains first strike until end of turn.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0.

name: Mine Worker
oracle_text: {T}: You gain 1 life. If you control creatures named Power Plant Worker and Tower Worker, you gain 3 life instead.
flavor_text: Following his hunger for knowledge and power from the past, Urza starved Dominaria's future.

name: Mishra's Domination
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
As long as you control enchanted creature, it gets +2/+2. Otherwise, it can't block.
flavor_text: Power radiated from the Weakstone, binding the dragon engine to Mishra's command.

name: Mishra's Juggernaut
oracle_text:
Trample
Mishra's Juggernaut attacks each combat if able.
Unearth {5}{R} ({5}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Mishra's Onslaught
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Create two 1/1 colorless Soldier artifact creature tokens.
• Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Hah. Urza has underestimated my strength yet again."
—Mishra

name: Moment of Defiance
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +2/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "Well? What are you waiting for? Let's not keep the buzzards waiting."

name: Overwhelming Remorse
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard.
Exile target creature or planeswalker.
flavor_text: Tocasia's face haunted his vision. The explosion still rung in his ears. Mishra kept running and never once looked back.

name: Penregon Strongbull
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice an artifact: Penregon Strongbull gets +1/+1 until end of turn and deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: His child-lifting act was second only to his cauldron-punting routine.

name: Perimeter Patrol
oracle_text: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Perimeter Patrol gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Fallaji quickly learned that the Kher Ridges held too many caves and valleys to be surveyed from the air alone.

name: Phalanx Vanguard
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Phalanx Vanguard gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The cool, sleek automatons beside her mirrored her own iron resolve.

name: Power Plant Worker
oracle_text: {3}: Power Plant Worker gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If you control creatures named Mine Worker and Tower Worker, put two +1/+1 counters on Power Plant Worker instead. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text: Mechanical workers toiled away, tirelessly fueling the impossible.

name: Powerstone Engineer
oracle_text: When Powerstone Engineer dies, create a tapped Powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")
flavor_text: "Well there's your problem—resonance leak lowering output by thirty percent. I can patch that up."

name: Powerstone Fracture
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
flavor_text:
"Move! When the powerstone blows, that behemoth will be nothing but a hole in the ground."
—Ashnod, to Hajar

name: Prison Sentence
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Prison Sentence enters the battlefield, scry 2.
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
flavor_text: War prisoners were ineffective political pawns, as neither brother cared enough to trade for them.

name: Ravenous Gigamole
oracle_text: When Ravenous Gigamole enters the battlefield, mill three cards. You may put a creature card from among the cards milled this way into your hand. If you don't, put a +1/+1 counter on Ravenous Gigamole. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

name: Raze to the Ground
oracle_text:
This spell can't be countered.
Destroy target artifact. If its mana value was 1 or less, draw a card.
flavor_text: First one, then a second, then a third of the ivory towers fell to the invaders, who moved in a circle around the city like an apocalyptic clock.

name: Recommission
oracle_text: Return target artifact or creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. If a creature enters the battlefield this way, it enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: "Put your backs into it! If we don't lay claim to it, the Fallaji will!"

name: Retrieval Agent
oracle_text: {2}: Retrieval Agent gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The humming tome burned his leather glove, nearly taking his hand along with it. Then a strange power coursed through him.

name: Roc Hunter
oracle_text: Reach
flavor_text: "Never track the roc itself with your eyes, for it will swoop with the sun at its back and blind you. Instead, track its shadow and, when it's almost upon you, heave your javelin upward with all your might."

name: Rust Goliath
oracle_text:
Prototype {3}{G}{G} — 3/5 (You may cast this spell with different mana cost, color, and size. It keeps its abilities and types.)
Reach, trample
flavor_text:
"You know those seedpods cluttering the eastern approach? I've got an idea . . . ."
—Calle, Urzan sergeant

name: Scatter Ray
oracle_text: Counter target artifact or creature spell unless its controller pays {4}.
flavor_text: Mishra's army demanded the secrets of the Third Path. Hurkyl's followers graciously showed them.

name: Scrapwork Cohort
oracle_text:
When Scrapwork Cohort enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Soldier artifact creature token.
Unearth {2}{W} ({2}{W}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

oracle_text:
When Scrapwork Mutt enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Scrapwork Rager
oracle_text:
When Scrapwork Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
Unearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Shoot Down
oracle_text: Exile target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.
flavor_text: Gwenna stayed her hand only once, to save young Harbin's life—a mistake she would never repeat.

name: Sibling Rivalry
oracle_text: Gain control of target artifact or creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. Create a tapped Powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")

name: Stern Lesson
oracle_text: Draw two cards, then discard a card. Create a tapped Powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")
flavor_text:
"The brothers are brilliant, but their quarreling will be the death of me."
—Tocasia, journal entry

name: Stone Retrieval Unit
oracle_text: When Stone Retrieval Unit enters the battlefield, create a tapped Powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")
flavor_text: Automatons could be rebuilt. Powerstones could not.

name: Supply Drop
oracle_text:
Flash
When Supply Drop enters the battlefield, target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Supply Drop: Draw a card.
flavor_text: New armaments, fresh provisions, and best of all, dry socks.

name: Survivor of Korlis
oracle_text:
First strike
{1}{W}, Exile Survivor of Korlis from your graveyard: Scry 2.
flavor_text: At first, the merchant state of Korlis saw no need to involve itself in the conflict between Yotia and the Fallaji. Mishra's dragon engines changed that.

name: Swiftgear Drake
oracle_text:
Flying, haste
When Swiftgear Drake enters the battlefield, put up to one target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor_text: Inspired by fishing raptors, Tawnos designed the drake's talons to seize prey with overwhelming speed and precision.

name: Tawnos's Tinkering
oracle_text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target artifact, creature, or land you control. Untap that permanent. If it isn't a creature, it becomes a 0/0 creature in addition to its other types.
flavor_text: While his master tried to surpass nature, Tawnos aimed to capture its beauty.

name: Third Path Savant
oracle_text: {7}: Draw two cards.
flavor_text: As Mishra's army bore down on Terisia City, Corlo felt his focus, his patience, and his willpower twine together. With a deep breath, he plucked answers from the air.

name: Thraxodemon
oracle_text: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature or artifact: Draw a card.
flavor_text: Urza and Mishra weren't the only denizens of Terisiare to covet the powerstones' energy.

name: Tocasia's Dig Site
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}, {T}: Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: Sent by their noble parents to toughen up and learn something of the world's past, Urza and Mishra instead uncovered Terisiare's future.

name: Tocasia's Onulet
oracle_text:
When Tocasia's Onulet leaves the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
Unearth {3}{W} ({3}{W}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Tomakul Honor Guard
oracle_text: Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
flavor_text: In the Great Desert, one law is enforced over all others: water belongs to all.

name: Tomakul Scrapsmith
oracle_text: When Tomakul Scrapsmith enters the battlefield, mill three cards. You may put an artifact card from among the cards milled this way into your hand. If you don't, put a +1/+1 counter on Tomakul Scrapsmith. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

name: Tower Worker
oracle_text:
Reach
{T}: Add {C}. If you control creatures named Mine Worker and Power Plant Worker, add {C}{C}{C} instead.
flavor_text: Even Urza's most mundane creations shared his obsession with perfection.

name: Trench Stalker
oracle_text: As long as you've drawn two or more cards this turn, Trench Stalker has deathtouch and lifelink.
flavor_text: It can hear a panicked heartbeat from a thousand paces away.

name: Union of the Third Path
oracle_text: Draw a card, then you gain life equal to the number of cards in your hand.
flavor_text: Terisia City at last opened its ivory towers to all who sought respite from the endless war.

name: Unleash Shell
oracle_text: Unleash Shell deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker and 2 damage to that permanent's controller.
flavor_text: The new cannon's destructive power more than made up for its unpredictable blast radius.

name: Urza's Rebuff
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Counter target spell.
• Tap up to two target creatures.
flavor_text:
"As usual, my brother's maneuvers are brash and impulsive."
—Urza

name: Veteran's Powerblade
Warlord's Elite
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap two untapped artifacts, creatures, and/or lands you control.
flavor_text: "The Warlord thinks we've gone soft, does he? The Fist of Progress will prove him wrong!"

name: Wasteful Harvest
oracle_text: Mill five cards. You may put a permanent card from among the cards milled this way into your hand. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: Once the brothers discovered the pristine island of Argoth, the war came down to who could plunder it faster.

name: Weakstone's Subjugation
oracle_text:
Enchant artifact or creature
When Weakstone's Subjugation enters the battlefield, you may pay {3}. If you do, tap enchanted permanent.
Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Whirling Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike and trample until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I will trust desert steel in Fallaji hands over a soulless machine any day."
—Hajar, Mishra's bodyguard

name: Wing Commando
oracle_text:
Flying
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: "The welds are weaker at the top."

name: Yotian Medic
oracle_text: Lifelink
flavor_text:
"Go, save as many as you can! The city walls may be rubble, but Kroog will live on in its people."
—Queen Kayla bin-Kroog
